Posts.EditableText:
If you think that there are additional threads that should be moved to the Libraries and Code section, just write a PN!

By the way, threats like "How to write a menu" or "How do I create status attributes" shouldn't be created in the new forum. They should be added to the wiki or to the old Quest5 forum.
